actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

official_title: Honoring Rick Lee Schwartz and Milt Stollak, who died in a plane crash on July 18, 2002, while fighting the Big Elk fires near Estes Park, Colorado.

summary.text: Honors the bravery and service of firefighters Rick Lee Schwartz and Milt Stollack who died in a plane crash on July 18, 2002, while fighting the Big Elk fires near Estes Park, Colorado. Urges individuals to contribute to the Air Tanker 123 Memorial Fund honoring such men.

titles.title: Honoring Rick Lee Schwartz and Milt Stollak, who died in a plane crash on July 18, 2002, while fighting the Big Elk fires near Estes Park, Colorado.
